Blog.post: where is everybody. We were having so much fun with this thing and now it is no more....Do we need a conversation topic....How about Roller Coasters... I don't like roller coasters that go upside down or backwards. I prefer the white water intertubes
So, I join and ya'll run away. what's up with that? Must be nice not to have to do any work... *sigh* Well, guess I gotta go and find someone else to talk to..... Love ya'll!

glad you're on! when you have free time, edit your profile, then when you view your profile, you can click on any of the interests and it takes you to a list of other members with the same interests... i already commented on an australian dude's blog who likes ice hockey! too bad he wasn't on jdate last year ;-)

So, what's up peoples.... This is pretty cool, as soon as you find out how to use the freekin thing... ROAR!! Kristi that pic is so cute.... finally one of you smiling!! I'm at work, not too much to do right now, surprisingly.... But this is cool since I can't check hotmail from here... Well, gotta run, there's some eyes checking out my screen... Yeah, I'm talking to you damn it, stop looking at my gosh damn screen fool!!! =o)
woo hoo it is FRIDAY....I can't wait until SUNDAY!!!
i can't wait until we are all on here so we can all catch up!
urlLink Look at me aren't I cute...we can post pictures and this is my first one....I took this myself so that is why it isn't that grand...but it is a pic urlLink

I invited cinny so she should be able to post now. Woo hoo... I got my Old navy stuff...woo hoo I am going to be in bowie this weekend in case you forgot. I am staying with kelly brown and giovanna is coming down. they also got invites so hopefully they will post something soon. We don't know where we are going to go yet, but you are more than welcome to meet us at the bar...and we can all hang out and catch up. I will give you guys a call to let you know where we will be and hopefully I will see you guys there. Love you

where o where has verla gone oh where o where can she be? she must be doing work, glad it's not me oh where o where can she be? where o where has cindy been oh where o where has she gone? she's trying to register but a blank she has drawn oh where o where has she gone? why o why have i not gotten the hint oh why o why am i lame? talking to myself can't keep me sane oh why o why am i lame?

she checks her e-mail when she's at her mom's house which i believe will be tonight and/or sunday night. so send her an e-mail so that she can join and also so she can look through the site to see if she can access it at her work. i like the new title, but when i first came on, i was confused (not surprising). i didn't know why i was in this blog instead of at the burd-itti one. now i understand...

Still bored. The mail came in, but it just doesn't look interesting enough to give up reading and playing on the web. My brother's not coming to the bar tonight, so hopefully it won't be too boring. Verla, why don't you just come up to Baltimore for the rest of the weekend and I'll take off tomorrow also, making a five day weekend.?? I made Cindy and Pookie watch Kill Bill last night and even though Pookie can't stand tarantino, they both liked the movie, not as much as I did, but at least they enjoyed it. Netflix should be sending me dickie roberts & scary movie 3 tonight but they are slacking on the indie movie i want. i mailed all three dvd's back to them at the same time, yet they've only received two. now i definitely believe they are located in maryland and that their employees must be from the area also since they can't seem to count nor conquer their illiteracy problem ;-) I'll probably post again in a couple hours, but for now, it's time to dig into my boring subway sandwich. (The woman who makes my same sub every week was laughing at me more than usual today. And when I say laughing, I mean hysterical, as the other english-speaking employees and I were as well. She was trying to get me to try something different or add a few more veggies. She even said she would give me a separate sample cup. But to no avail, I can only have so many veggies on my veggie sub!)

So Verla, is this so we can chat without my boss knowing i'm on a personal call? If so, it's perfect! ;-) Seriously though, i cannot wait until sunday night. i'm drinking and drinking some more. monday morning, don't wake me up ;-) hey, is the room a smoking room??? And if so, do you mind if I smoke this weekend-days
this is my first posting...just trying to figure out how this thing works...I'm gonna invite my friends to visit and post on my blogger. I think this is kinda neat.
My hermit crab's name is Mayfield. It means warrior. Woo Hoo Mayfield

I need a name for my Hermit Crab. Any suggustions. It must be unisex. I have had it for 2 weeks and it has been nameless. I think he is getting depressed because I haven't named it. Happy Friday. I'm so totally bored. I'm hoping to get lucky this weekend, so wish me luck. Woo hoo
Since no one has written anything....Happy July!! hola! what's up? what's going on? talk to yaz next month! ;-P
